generalComments1: This file contains all NPCs, with fields to define their interactions, behaviors, and other properties in the game.
generalComments2: usedOn.useTogetherLocation can be a screenId or an object/npc if two elements can be used together anywhere, but they must both point to each other for this to work.
generalComments3: questPhase is the current phase ie if it is 0 you can give the monkey a banana for a battery if it is 1 you cannot but may be able to do something else
generalComments4: dialoguePhase is the current dialogue phase ie if it is 0 and you talk to the monkey, you will hear that the monkey is hungry, then 1 will be here take the battery, and 2 just chatter

npcMonkeyDEBUG.comment: When objectBananaDEBUG is used or given to Monkey, it speaks and gives player 10 objectBatteryDEBUG
